attributes.action: Put speed bumps on woodnook road, appley bridge, WN69JT.
attributes.additional_details: There is a few shops and a school, kids walk down morning and night going school
attributes.background: The speed limit is 20, i have seen drivers reaching 50, you know its 50 when you have been driver 35 years, someone soon is going to be killed. Drivers also come off back lane and dart down woodnook road only to come out at the other end. Mindless driving and soon someone WILL be killed.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Safety on local roads is the responsibility of your local council.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
